name: Pokémon Life Stream Demo 1.0
description:
Hello, and Welcome to the Pokémon LifeStream.

This game for those who don´t understand, it is a junction between Pokémon and Final Fantasy.

Created by WhiteFeather Projects.

Who is WhiteFeather Projects?

Is a team that takes ideas, develops and creates existing projects.

Go through our Facebook page and leave your lik to keep up with new updates. https://www.facebook.com/WhiteFeather2017Games/

Pokémon Life Stream Demo 1.0 is the first public demo of WhiteFeather Projects.

System requirements:The game easily runs on new hardware.
Minimum (tested) System Requirements:
OS: Windows 7 or 10
Ram: 8GB (lower is not tested)
GPU: AMD Radeon R9 200 Series
CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2400 CPU  - @ 3.10GHz 4 Cores (lower not tested)

Series: Pokémon

Director(s): Shigeru Ohmori
Developer: Game Freak
Platform: Nintendo
Publishers: Nintendo, The Pokémon Company

This is a fan made Project and has no ties to Nintendo or the Pokemon Company. 
I made this because I love the Pokemon series and wanted to make something that would pay tribute and put a smile on the face of other fans.

You need the first part to extract the other files for free. Pokémon Life Stream Demo 1.0 Purchase Pokémon Life Stream Demo 1.0.z01 Free Pokémon Life Stream Demo 1.0.z02 Free Pokémon Life Stream Demo 1.0.z03 Free
